memberSignatures.value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type CreateSurrogateType(class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema schema) cil managed

parameters.name: schema
parameters.summary: The schema to generate a compatible type for.

returns.summary:
<see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> if the schema is an array schema (or a union schema
            containing only array/null schemas), <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> if the
            schema is a map schema (or a union schema containing only map/null schemas), and
            <see cref="T:System.Object" /> otherwise.

overloads.summary: Creates a type that can be used to deserialize missing record fields.
